tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE SustainabilityInitiative (
	initiative_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	initiative_name VARCHAR(255),
	strategy VARCHAR(255),
	start_date DATE,
	end_date DATE,
	impact_reduction DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE strategy (
    strategy_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    strategy_name TEXT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    focus_area TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE impact_measurement (
    measurement_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    strategy_id INT,
    metric_name TEXT,
    value FLOAT,
    measurement_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (strategy_id) REFERENCES strategy(strategy_id)
);

CREATE TABLE sustainability_initiative (
    initiative_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    initiative_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    start_date DATE NOT NULL,
    end_date DATE NOT NULL,
    total_cost DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Initiative (
 id INT NOT NULL,
 name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
 description TEXT,
 start_date DATE,
 end_date DATE,
 PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

CREATE TABLE ImpactMeasurement (
 id INT NOT NULL,
 initiative_id INT NOT NULL,
 metric_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
 metric_value FLOAT NOT NULL,
 measurement_date DATE,
 PRIMARY KEY (id),
 FOREIGN KEY (initiative_id) REFERENCES Initiative(id)
);

CREATE TABLE StrategyImplementation (
 strategy_id INT NOT NULL,
 initiative_id INT NOT NULL,
 implementation_date DATE,
 success BOOLEAN,
 FOREIGN KEY (strategy_id) REFERENCES Strategy(id),
 FOREIGN KEY (initiative_id) REFERENCES Initiative(id)
);

CREATE TABLE sustainability_initiative (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    description TEXT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE environmental_impact_metrics (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    initiative_id INT,
    metric_name VARCHAR(255),
    metric_value FLOAT,
    FOREIGN KEY (initiative_id) REFERENCES sustainability_initiative(id)
);

CREATE TABLE reduction_strategies (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    initiative_id INT,
    strategy_name VARCHAR(255),
    strategy_description TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (initiative_id) REFERENCES sustainability_initiative(id)
);

CREATE TABLE team_members (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    initiative_id INT,
    member_name VARCHAR(255),
    role VARCHAR(100),
    FOREIGN KEY (initiative_id) REFERENCES sustainability_initiative(id)
);

CREATE TABLE reports (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    initiative_id INT,
    report_date DATE,
    report_content TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (initiative_id) REFERENCES sustainability_initiative(id)
);
